author: hgs
content: When you open it up, can you open it flat? With most laptops I can’t get my reading glasses close enough to the bottom of the screen to read the small text without putting my chin through the keyboard. If I can fold it flat I’d be able to read it like any flat surface. Thank you.

author: Phil
content: hgs: Yes, you can push the screen back so it is at the same angle as the keyboard, and you can even push it a few degrees beyond that. If you’re having a problem with small text, it would probably be more prudent to (a) use programs that allow text size to be increased or (b) install screen magnifier software.
